properties.hInfo: This is where I live now. I live on the 2nd floor of a Chinatown walk-up, above a Chinese food restaurant called "Forever Taste." I love the area, I get to practice Chinese and I live two blocks from the East River.

This was actually a closet. Somehow Lizzie and I shared this room for the two months after I first arrived in the city. Every morning we had to move our clothes from the floor to the bed to get out of the room.

properties.hTitle: A Strange New Cottage in Brooklyn
properties.hInfo: My first real home in NYC, I moved here with Lizzie after living in the City for only a few months. We shared this strange and ecclectic 3 bedroom apartment with three wonderful friends.
I lived here as a way to motivate myself to find my own place. I found a passport of a friend under my bed and it turns out he was boinking the previous tenant of the room.
